author: Staff Reporter
text:
A fire broke out on Sub-Registrar’s office premises here on Friday evening.

Some employees noticed smoke emanating from the power generator room on the premises.

Responding to en emergency call received at 5.35 p.m., Fire and Rescue Services personnel attached to Thoothukudi Fire Station rushed to the spot and extinguished the fire after struggling for half an hour, V. Mariappan, Station Officer (Transport), Thoothukudi, who led the operation, said.

The fire erupted from the power generator, which was functional when power supply was suspended, and it could not withstand the power load, he said.
title: Fire in Sub-Registrar’s office
